roleset.name: create

example.name: passive, with source
example.text: [About 30% of Ratners's profit]-1 already is derived *trace*-1 from the U.S.

example.name: ergative, with source
example.text: Prosecutors have told Mr. Antar's attorneys that they believe Mr. Antar's allegedly ill-gotten gains are so great that any money he has used to pay attorneys derives from illegal activities.
example.arg: any money he has used to pay attorneys

example.name: with creator and attribute
example.text: John derived an ointment from beeswax, spring water and cigarette butts as a cure for the common cold.
example.arg: from beeswax, spring water and cigarette butts
as a cure for the common cold

roleset.note: Comparison to 'develop'. Member of VNcls create-26.4, appear-48.1.1, deduce-97.2.

example.name: Math/science attribute usage
example.text: [An expression for the four-potential of an em field]-1 is derived *trace*-1 as a path integral involving the fields, the formula being analogous to one given in elementary vector analysis.
example.arg: as a path integral involving the fields
the formula being analogous to one given in elementary vector analysis

predicate.note: Frames file for 'derive' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
